title: Drugs log
description: Each entry characterizes a dose of medication taken at pre-defined intervals

diagnosis_id.description: Reference to the diagnosis requiring the medication.

drug_atc_code.description: The Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) Classification System of medications - a reference code.

admin_route.description: equivalent to ATC classification's Route of administration (Adm.R)

dosage_amount.description: a scalar indicating quantity of dose in specified units

dosage_units.description: equivalent to ATC classification's dosage units.

body_site_code.description: Body site administered to.  From FHIR/SNOWMED CT's Value Set http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/approach-site-codes
